about_the_game:
This game is currently live on Kickstarter! Go and check it out!
Welcome to Loftilla. Legend has it that the great bird Archeos created this land long ago. It has been at peace for generations; However, the kingdom is restless as the great chains begin to shake. They hold the only being powerful enough to rival Archeos and destroy this paradise. Take up the power of the relics and adventure into the unknowns to save Loftilla from this dangerous beast! Dive into this mythical world where everything may not be as you've been told.

Game Features

  • Explore the mythical world of Loftilla! With many beautiful regions, every location will be memorable.
  • Take combat movement to the next level with the shield bash mechanic! Ricochet around arena's with calculated angles and momentums.
  • Create your own combat experience with the relic system! Find and upgrade legendary relics that grant new combat abilities and moves.
  • Prove your strength against lots of enemy types and several massive bosses!
  • Accept and complete many different quests on your journey. The game features a main quest line along with tons of side quests to learn more about this festinating world and culture.
  • Take a break at several peaceful locations and kick back to the soulful OST. Featherborn aims to create an experience to remember!
